/home/kali/tools/recon/recon_readme.txt.content: Recon toolset (simulated). Use nmap, nikto, dirb in backend mode.

/root/README.root.content: root account - simulation only. No real keys included.

/usr/share/man_sim/nmap.1.txt.content:
NMAP(1)                     Network Scanner                     NMAP(1)

NAME
    nmap - Network exploration tool and security / port scanner.

SYNOPSIS
    nmap [Scan Type(s)] [Options] {target specification}  

DESCRIPTION
    Nmap ("Network Mapper") is a security scanner used to discover hosts and services on a computer network.

EXAMPLE
    nmap -sV 192.168.1.0/24

/usr/share/man_sim/ssh.1.txt.content:
SSH(1)                        OpenSSH client                     SSH(1)

NAME
    ssh - OpenSSH SSH client (remote login program)

SYNOPSIS
    ssh [-l user] host

DESCRIPTION
    ssh connects and logs into the specified host, which must be running an ssh server.

EXAMPLE
    ssh root@10.0.0.50

/usr/share/man_sim/ifconfig.8.txt.content:
IFCONFIG(8)            Configure network interfaces         IFCONFIG(8)

NAME
    ifconfig - configure a network interface

SYNOPSIS
    ifconfig [interface] [address] netmask [mask]

DESCRIPTION
    ifconfig displays or configures network interface parameters.

/usr/share/man_sim/msfconsole.1.txt.content:
MSFCONSOLE(1)              Metasploit Framework               MSFCONSOLE(1)

NAME
    msfconsole - Metasploit Framework console (simulated)

DESCRIPTION
    msfconsole is the most popular interface to the Metasploit Framework, providing an interactive console.
